channel.title: Background not found anywhere
channel.description:
After getting a new client today, I can't find out where the background is. There must be 4-5+ images in their respective folders, but none of them are the same as the loading background.
I've searched "title" and "background" in various files, and even used the Z-FileSearcher to hopefully add ease to my search, by I've still turned up with nothing.
My guess is either the file is hidden or the client links to a url to load its background image. Either way (my guesses or no), can anyone help me change it?
Thanks.

item.title: Background not found anywhere
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Yankee Mr Yankee
item.description:
@Mr_Yankee wrote:

What I came up with was a titlebox directory, which when I changed it it didn’t take any effect. I’ll check again, but I don’t think I’ll find anything.

Plus, wouldn’t there have to be a file somewhere for it to load the background?

EDIT: Nope, nothin found. A search for “title” resulted in finding my titlebox again, so I copied that snippet and made one for “title” and “background”, but no luck that way.

Read full topic

item.title: Background not found anywhere
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 deals with images. Try searching there.

Read full topic
